sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.CON_ID, /*연계ID*/ SUBSTR(A.CON_LG_REGI_DH,1,14) AS CON_LG_REGI_DH, /*연계로그등록일시*/ A.RCPT_DOC_NM, /*수신문서명*/ A.LG_TXT /*로그내용*/ FROM TBCSPIIT010H A /*PC장비관리테이블*/ WHERE 1=1
AND A.CON_LG_REGI_DH >= #strCON_LG_REGI_DHS#||'000000000'
AND A.CON_LG_REGI_DH <= #strCON_LG_REGI_DHE#||'999999999'
AND A.CON_ID LIKE '%'||#strCON_ID#||'%'
